segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, stretching as high as he can to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, like nothing else matters but that jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is already tilting, and he doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for her share like it’s the most natural thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious to the whole thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a moment of pure childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is just adding to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he gets down safely before the stool gives out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene feels like a snapshot of a memory.
segments.speaker: PAR
